alignment_metadata.performance_notes: Executed as part of integration testing chain

conflicts_detected.description: Project Assessment entity broader scope than organizational Skills Assessment

resolution_options.description: Define Skills Assessment as specialization of broader Assessment concept
resolution_options.impact: Maintains both concepts while clarifying relationship

resolution_options.description: Rename project Assessment to ProjectAssessment for clarity
resolution_options.impact: Avoids confusion with organizational Skills Assessment

conflicts_detected.description: ProjectOwner authority scope differs from Team Lead team-focused responsibilities

resolution_options.description: Position ProjectOwner as higher authority level than Team Lead
resolution_options.impact: Clarifies authority relationships and decision-making chain

resolution_options.description: Keep ProjectOwner in project governance, Team Lead in skill development
resolution_options.impact: Maintains domain separation with clear role boundaries
